resources.string:
The king has called all the Iron Throne aspirants from all over Westeros to Kingslanding to find out who is the most suitable to command the armies against the threat of the Night King, in this game you are one of those contenders and you will explore the Red Keep while you participate in strategy duels with all the Lords
-Gameplay: Movement on a 2D stage (pokemon style) on a linear map that you can explore at the same time to obtain bonuses (you will meet characters that share advice with you that the game will interpret as bonuses), the opponents will be found on the map, which they will interrupt you and challenge you, the challenge will be in turns pokemon style
